'''Scroll of the Hero of Cinder City''' is an [[Artifact Set]] available at [[:Category:4-Star Artifacts|4-star]] and [[:Category:5-Star Artifacts|5-star]] rarities. It is obtained from [[Sanctum of Rainbow Spirits]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* 4-Piece set bonus:
** [[Dendro Core]]-consuming reactions provide DMG Bonuses for {{Dendro}} and their respective trigger element. They do not grant {{Hydro}} DMG Bonus.
*** {{Color|Pyro|Burgeon}} grants {{Pyro}} and {{Dendro}} DMG Bonuses.
*** {{Color|Electro|Hyperbloom}} grants {{Electro}} and {{Dendro}} DMG Bonuses.
** For [[Catalyze]] reactions:
*** Quicken and {{Color|Electro|Aggravate}} grant {{Electro}} and  {{Dendro}} DMG bonuses.
*** {{Color|Dendro|Spread}} only grants {{Dendro}} DMG bonus.
** [[Shatter]] does not grant any DMG Bonuses.
** As stated in the description, the 4-Piece bonus effect ''does not'' stack with itself but triggering another reaction during the buff refreshes its duration.
** Triggering a different second reaction will give the corresponding DMG bonuses to that reaction, while maintaining the bonuses of any other previous reactions. The duration of these buffs is calculated separately.
** A non-Natlan unit triggering the 12% DMG Bonus buff will not overwrite the 40% DMG Bonus triggered by a Natlan unit.
